title: King of Emeralds
title_jp: [キング・オブ・エメラルド]

profile.self_intro: Ohoho! My name is King Halo. As a first-rate competitor, you can naturally expect great things from me. Rest assured, King Halo will be a household name soon enough.
profile.tagline: Extremely haughty. Her pride extends to the heavens!
profile.ears: Uninterested in hearing anything that isn't first-rate
profile.tail: Even her tail movements are first-rate
profile.weak: Things unsuitable for a king, such as crowds and heat
profile.family: Her mother is terrible at housework, so they have a full-time maid
secrets: Did you know? She'll keep playing raffles until she wins or empties her wallet.

profile_id.self_intro: Ohoho! Namaku King Halo. Sebagai pesaing kelas atas, tentu kamu bisa berharap banyak dariku. Tenang saja, King Halo akan jadi nama yang dikenal semua orang!
profile_id.tagline: Sangat angkuh—kesombongannya menjulang hingga ke langit!
profile_id.ears: Tak tertarik mendengar apa pun yang bukan kelas atas.
profile_id.tail: Bahkan gerakan ekornya pun kelas atas.
profile_id.weak: Hal-hal yang tidak pantas untuk seorang raja—seperti keramaian dan panas.
profile_id.family: Ibunya buruk dalam pekerjaan rumah tangga, jadi keluarga mereka mempekerjakan asisten rumah tangga tetap.
secrets: Tahukah kamu? Dia akan terus ikut undian sampai menang—atau dompetnya kosong.
